name: Alien Landing
description:
You are playing as Dexter, an Alien stranded on earth having lost his memories. You make your way and try to help the locals with their needs in order to go back to where you came from.

This game was made under the htk Academy curriculum as a 2nd Semester Project

I would like to thank my lecturers for their continuous support and feedback while working on this, aswell as their lessons which made this game possible to create for me

The game is currently available for Windows PC's and includes Controller Support
